app.title: Self Love
app.subtitle: 15 questions to build your self-love practice. Play as often as needed.

startScreen.title: Self Love Starter Pack
description: 15 questions to build your self-love practice.

self-love.name: Self Love
self-love.description: Gentle, honest questions for your relationship with yourself

questions.question: What gave you a sense of achievement recently?
What do you no longer need?
What's one thing you healed from, and how?
What is difficult to forgive yourself for?
What have you grown to love about yourself?
What do you have great taste in?
Where are you giving too much?
How do you measure your own success?
What do you need more than you'd like to admit?
What are you trying to unlearn about love?
What help could you ask for, even if it's difficult?
What pattern do you want to break, even if you don't know how yet?
What do you no longer want to wait for?
Who are you in the process of becoming?
